game_config.mods:
Default 233780
<mod key='Arma3_2' Profiling/Performance Build USE WITH CAUTION 233780 profiling CautionSpecialProfilingAndTestingBranchArma3

param.caption: Max RAM allocated
param.desc: Maximum usable memory in MB, for example: 1024

param.caption: IP address of Target Server
param.desc: IP address of target dedicated ARMA3 server. Ensure the server includes this servers external IP address to its Headless client list in server.cfg as well as the mission has the appropriate configuration for headless client usage. Reference https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Arma_3_Headless_Client

param.caption: Port Number of Target Server
param.desc: Port of target dedicated ARMA3 server.
